title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 2394.13 - Priority of scheduling
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 2394.13 - Priority of scheduling

State Regulations
(a) Unless the State Tax Commission has rendered a decision as provided in
subdivision (a) of section
2394.10
of
this Part and the warrant has been vacated pursuant thereto, any person, to
whom the provisions of this Part are applicable and who has otherwise timely
petitioned for a hearing as provided for in the applicable sections of the Tax

Law to which Part 3000 of this Title is applicable, is entitled to and shall be
granted a priority of scheduling as to the hearing of said petition by the Tax

Appeals Bureau. (b) Written request
for a priority of scheduling of hearing of such petitions shall be made to: New York State Tax Commission

Director of Tax Appeals Bureau

Building 9, State Office Campus

Albany, NY 12227
(c) The provisions of this section shall not
apply where the hearing provided for in this Part and the hearing provided for
in Part 3000 of this Title have been consolidated pursuant to section
2394.11
of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
2394.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
